Name: Gin Punch No. 2
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Easy on the palate yet incredibly complex. Linseed oil notes of genever shine through.
History: Adapted from Hebert Asbury's 1928 reprint of Jerry Thomas' 1862 How to Mix Drinks, or The Bon Vivant's Companion .
